greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Product_{d|n, d<n} prime(A305793(1+d)-1), where A305973(k) records the prime signature of 2k-1.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
program: (PARI) A305982(n) = { my(m=1); fordiv(n, d, if((d<n), m *= prime(A305973(1+d)-1))); (m); }; \\ Needs also code from A305973.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 15 2018
